creator: joliver@mdacorporation.com
text:
Currently JMeter only allows 1 file to be uploaded per http(s) request.  Many 
websites require multiple files to be uploaded in a single request...such as 
mine ;)

From reading the xml output of the .jmx file, I've noticed that request 
parameters, for a http sampler, are stored in a collection whereas there is 
only room for one http file.  Solution is probably to make a collection 
available for http files and update the submission system--but that is just 
what it seems to me.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 19128 ***
